Comment:
When I have spoken to people and asked, given the choice what would you prefer to trade? An active knight for a strong bishop, or vice versa? The majority usually opt to trade the knight for an opponents bishop I would say, in my experience. However this game serves as an example of just how lethal a pair of active knights really can be.
      The English, I like this opening myself, which means I also know how it works...
I stake my claim on the center, white cannot be given time to consolidate a strong center himself..
